settings.name: Darren Despagne
settings.title: Architect
settings.summary: Aspiring architectural designer with hands-on construction experience and proficiency in AutoCAD and SketchUp, passionate about sustainable design.

items.description:
Beginning design and documentation of a client’s first adaptive reuse project, transforming an existing garage into livable guest rooms for Airbnb use.

Preparing complete architectural drawings including floor plans, elevations, sections, and construction details aligned with code standards.

Applying hands-on construction knowledge (framing, concrete, carpentry) to ensure design feasibility and accurate detailing.

Balancing client needs with market appeal, integrating comfort, privacy, and functional layouts into a compact footprint.

This project marks the launch of Despagne Architecture’s client-facing work, establishing a reputation for clarity and adaptive reuse solutions.
Restored healing garden, built balcony structure, constructed indoor overhangs, fabricated wooden furniture, interpreted blueprints, and performed concrete work.

items.title: Tartan Grid House
items.description: Designed multi-story residential concept using modular grid system. Modeled circulation, cantilevered volumes, and material contrasts. Produced exploded isometrics and sectional studies.

items.title: Bird Blind Structure
items.description: Designed sloped-roof shelter with multi-height viewing gaps. Integrated wood, concrete, and steel for minimal environmental impact.

items.title: Residential Site Concept
items.description: Created 3D site model with house, pool, and shed. Completed as a timed SketchUp challenge (under 2 hours).

items.title: Sustainable House Massing Models
items.description: Explored volumetric studies and passive design strategies. Integrated human scale and elevation modeling.

items.title: BM2 Lab 7
items.description: Drafted floor plans, elevations, sections, and foundation plan. Applied structural annotations and framing systems. Produced construction-ready documentation aligned with residential design standards.

items.title: Library Addition
items.description: Developed redesign concepts for a two-story library addition. Created floor plans, elevations, and 3D model studies. Presented design iterations with focus on circulation and usability.

items.institution: SUNY Orange - Orange County Community College
